name: Out Of Core Module
tagline: Support Big Image Operation (larger than 10G or more) : store, save, read and show
body:
### Information
**Out Of Core Module** is designed for easy operation on big image(even larger than 10G).
You can store a very big image in a low memory computer, manipulate the pixels, 
save it into the disk, and even read it back later for observation.
The Core Design of the module is to support big image operation even in **low memory computer**.

### Addition Libraries
* [boost](http://www.boost.org)
* [stxxl](http://stxxl.sourceforge.net)
